welcome.title: Welcome to Kuriamaindo
welcome.description: Explore our website and discover the best products and services.
welcome.permissions_message: We only need a few permissions to monitor apps and their notifications in order to close any unnecessary background processes. Your privacy is important and this apps DO NOT collect or share any personal data.

post_notifications.title: Post Notifications
post_notifications.description: Allow apps to post notifications in order to keep you informed about apps blocked

accesibility_services.title: Accessibility Services
accesibility_services.description: This permission is required to monitor apps in order to close them

notification_listener.title: Notification Listener
notification_listener.description: This permission is required to monitor notifications in order to close them
